t: Nest Labs: How iPod creator's smart thermostat became a top Google brand
s: July 21, 2022 - In 2014 — the same year Amazon launched its first Alexa-powered Echo home speaker — Google acquired Nest for $3.2 billion, its second-largest acquisition at that time behind Motorola.
